entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Minnedosa

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023
